title: Calories in 10 Chicken Wings
meta_description: Discover calories in 10 chicken wings, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per wing, and easy tweaks for different preparations.
assumptions: Bone-in, skin-on, fried; average size (~30 g meat per wing); no sauce or breading added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, cooking method, brand, and added ingredients like sauces. Check labels or recipes for precision.

quick_answer.text: 10 fried chicken wings provide ~900 kcal and ~65 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add buffalo sauce (1 tbsp per 5 wings)

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken wing?
faqs.a: About 90 kcal for one fried, skin-on chicken wing.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 10 chicken wings?

faqs.a: Plain wings have 0 g carbs; breading or sauce adds them.

faqs.q: Are these calories for fried or baked wings?
faqs.a: Assumed fried; baking reduces calories by ~20 per wing.

faqs.q: How does wing size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger wings (~40 g) add ~20-30 kcal each; smaller ones less.
